name: SmackTalk
0:
”Alexa, open Smack Talk”
”Alexa, tell Smack Talk to insult Bill”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smack talk
des:
Is someone talking smack?!! Get them with the perfect comeback with the Smack Talk skill for Amazon Alexa. 

Once you've made the wise decision to enable the skill, you'll be on your way to insulting every single one of your enemies! 

Just open the skill by saying, "Alexa, open Smack Talk". Then say, "Insult {Name}", saying the name of who you want to target! 

Users will also have the option to upgrade to a Premium packet, which will give access to high quality insults and comebacks from one of our great voice actors. 

Disclaimer: Please be advised Smack Talk contains material that may only be suited for a mature audience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
